segments.text: Excuse me , are you Sara Wilson ?
segments.speaker: S1

segments.text: Yes , I am.You must be Tom.Nice to meet you .
segments.speaker: S2

segments.text: Nice to meet you too.Let me help you with your bags .
segments.speaker: S1

segments.text: Be careful , Tom.Those are pretty heavy .
segments.speaker: S2

segments.text: Wow , you're not kidding.Hold on a second.Hello , could you give us a hand , please ?
segments.speaker: S1
